channel.title: Looking for help
channel.description:
making a client work with 64 bit vista (what would need to be changed) what file and what line of code because i get this every time i try to use any clients i have found so far (the source i downloaded and other servers ran by different people)
C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_16\bin;. is what my environmental variables are set to when i log in i can click to walk one time like before but if i try to walk another set of spaces the client crashed (like normal) and gave this error
A fatal error has been detected by the java runtime environment:
EXCEPTION_ACCESS_VIOLATION (0xc0000005) at pc=0x000000006d8e1d46, pid=5312, tid=3380
jre version: 6.0_16-b01 java vm: java hotspot(tm) 64-bit server vm (14.2-b01 mixed mode windows-amd64)
problematic frame: v [jvm.dll+0x51d46]
error report saved as hs_err_pid5312.log

item.title: Looking for help
